getTempFile

public static java.io.File getTempFile(java.lang.String id,
                                       java.io.File near)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Create a uniquely named temporary file of the form XXXnnnnn.tmp.

Parameters:
id - a string prepended on the file generated. Should you fail to delete it later, the id will help identify where it came from. null and "" also allowed.
near - Directory to create file in. Can also be a file, then temporary file is created in same directory. If null, one of these locations is used (sorted by preference; : is used as path.separator, / as file.separator ): 1) /tmp 2) /var/tmp 3) c:/temp 4) c:/windows/temp 5) / 6) current directory
Returns:
a temporary File with a unique name of the form XXXnnnnn.tmp.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
